meanings.definition: A person who lives in solitude, especially for religious reasons.
meanings.sent1: The hermit enjoyed spending time alone in the peaceful forest.
meanings.sent2: The old hermit lived in a small cabin deep in the woods.
meanings.sent3: The hermit chuckled as he realized he forgot to bring his favorite book to his secluded home.
meanings.sent4: Her life was like that of a hermit, hidden away from the chaos of the city.
meanings.sent5: The image of the hermit meditating under the ancient tree stayed with him for years.

meanings.definition: To live in solitude, especially for religious reasons.

meanings.sent2: He chose to hermit in the desert to focus on his spiritual journey.
meanings.sent3: The idea of hermiting in a cave seemed daunting but exciting at the same time.
meanings.sent4: In times of trouble, she would hermit in her room to reflect on her thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The artist hermited in his studio for days, creating a masterpiece in silence.
